name: DisseminatedChorioretinitisAndDisseminatedRetinochoroiditis
title: Disseminated Chorioretinitis and Disseminated Retinochoroiditis
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of disseminated chorioretinitis and/or retinochoroiditis.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of disseminated chorioretinal inflammation, disseminated retinochoroiditis, and placoid pigment epitheliopathy.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to 'unspecified eye.')
